name: Mr Mustachio
description:
You play as a dude with a gun and most importantly a mustache, fighting a great number of ennemis to at the end beat the final boss, an eye.

WASD to move 

SPACE to shoot

MOUSE to aim

credit:

boss music found here: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/

menu music: 

main game music: https://dominik-braun.net/retro-sounds/
